title: DeviceTvmSoftwareVulnerabilitiesKB
description: JSON Schema for Log Analytics table: DeviceTvmSoftwareVulnerabilitiesKB

AffectedSoftware.description: List of all software products affected by the vulnerability.

CveId.description: Unique identifier assigned to the security vulnerability under the Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) system.

CvssScore.description: Severity score assigned to the security vulnerability under the Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS).

IsExploitAvailable.description: Indicates whether exploit code for the vulnerability is publicly available.

LastModifiedTime.description: Date and time the item or related metadata was last modified.

PublishedDate.description: Date vulnerability was disclosed to the public.

SourceSystem.description: The type of agent the event was collected by. For example, OpsManager for Windows agent, either direct connect or Operations Manager, Linux for all Linux agents, or Azure for Azure Diagnostics

TimeGenerated.description: Date and time when the record was generated.

Timestamp.description: Date and time when the record was generated

VulnerabilityDescription.description: Description of the vulnerability and associated risks.

VulnerabilitySeverityLevel.description: Severity level assigned to the security vulnerability based on the CVSS score and dynamic factors influenced by the threat landscape.
